title: Nahuatl - An Indigenous Language of Mexico

media:group.media:title: Nahuatl - An Indigenous Language of Mexico
media:group.media:description:
This video is all about Nahuatl, the most widely spoken indigenous language of Mexico. 

►Learn a language with native teachers online using italki: http://go.italki.com/1Ojye8x
►Watch my video about MEXICO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ATBtwveHx74

●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬●

►Consultant and voice in the Nahuatl audio samples: Regulo Castro Hernandez

► The Nahuatl dialect map is from the following textbook:

"Escribo mi lengua. Nahuatl de Guerrero" MIBES 7.
Instituto Nacional para la Educación de los Adultos, INEA.
http://www.cursosinea.conevyt.org.mx/cursos/para_ser_alfabetizador_mib/contenidos/pdf/mibes7/01_n_guerrero_m7_libro.pdf

► Major source for the content of this video:  

"Lecciones para un curso del náhuatl moderno" by David Tuggy T.
https://scholars.sil.org/david_h_tuggy/es/publicaciones/nahuatl_lecciones/indice

► Full list of sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jSXCBNWQtk3UpJOTK8V0kmsMdkORl8ZFCst_oaQ5Igo/edit?usp=sharing
